tit.j: 福知山市都市緑化植物園
tit.e: The botanical garden for increasing plants in urban areas in Fukuchiyama City
The Botanical Garden for Increasing Plants in Urban aAreas in Fukuchiyama City
The Botanical Garden for Increasing Plants in Urban Areas in Fukuchiyama City

sen.j: 福知山市都市緑化植物園（ふくちやましとしりょくかしょくぶつえん）はスモール・テラ（SMALLTERRA・小さな地球）の愛称で呼ばれる、福知山市三段池公園にある植物園である。
sen.e: The botanical garden for increasing plants in urban areas in Fukuchiyama City, nicknamed Sumorutera (in Japanese pronounciation: perhaps indicates a small terrain, an small earth) is a botanical garden located in the Sandan-ike Pond park in Fukuchiayama City.

The Botanical Garden for Increasing Plants in Urban Areas in Fukuchiyama City, nicknamed Sumorutera (the Japanese pronunciation of 'Small Terra' or small Earth) is a botanical garden located in Sandan-ike Pond Park in Fukuchiyama City.
sen.cmt: Capitalization, spelling, grammar, changed for clarity.
sen.e: The Botanical Garden for Increasing Plants in Urban Areas in Fukuchiyama City, nicknamed "Sumoru-tera" (the Japanese pronunciation of 'Small Terra' or small Earth) is a botanical garden located in Sandan-ike Pond Park in Fukuchiyama City.
sen.cmt: 指示書（その他 2009/6/29) に従い、Sumorutera をクォーテーションでくくりました。「スモール・テラ」と「・」がついているので、ハイフンを入れました。 Sumorutera → Smoru-tera

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道・KTR北近畿タンゴ鉄道福知山駅から、京都交通 (舞鶴)で三段池公園下車
sen.e: Get on a bus of Kyoto Kotsu (based on Maizuru) from Fukuchiyama Station of West Japan Railway Company/Kitakinki tango Railway (KTR) and get off at the Sandan-ike Pond park.
From Fukuchiyama Station on the West Japan Railway Company/Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR) take the Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) and get off at Sandan-ike Pond Park.
From Fukuchiyama Station on the West Japan Railway Company/Kitakinki Tango Railway (KTR) take the Kyoto Kotsu Bus (Maizuru) and get off at Sandan-ike Pond Park.
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に合わせて修正Kyoto Kotsu bus → Kyoto Kotsu Bus
